snippet.title: Curseball - A roguelike where you choose the stages and curses that make the game more difficult!
snippet.description:
Play for free on itch.io https://kultisti.itch.io/curseball?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt Welcome To Curseball! Your goal: hit the ball before time runs out! Simple, right?

inside you'll find:
- 14 different curses & worlds!
- many colour palettes to unlock
- overuse of amen break

➡️ More from Kultisti https://kultisti.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More roguelikes https://itch.io/games/tag-roguelike?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames
